mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_in_record ( user_id, check_in_date, check_in_time, continuous_days, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{checkInDate}, #{checkInTime}, #{continuousDays}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, check_in_date, check_in_time, continuous_days, created_at FROM check_in_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND check_in_date = #{checkInDate} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, user_id, check_in_date, check_in_time, continuous_days, created_at FROM check_in_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY check_in_date DESC LIMIT 1
